title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-2.4 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-2.4 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provisions of this Subpart or the application thereof to any person or entity or circumstance is adjudged invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, such judgment shall not affect or impair the validity of the other provisions of this Subpart or the application thereof to other persons, entities, and circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
9-2.4

Adopted

New

York State Register February 5, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 05, eff. 2/5/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
